(Time: 10mins) - adding new button to WP Bakery page

Hi Anne,

Just a quick note to confirm that the button is now live and working on the Employment page.

Let me know if you need anything else on this one—always happy to help!

Hi Adriane Just a quick clarification for the new box you'd like added:
  • We'll place P&C-PRO-009 - Privacy Notice for Personnel next to the updated one as requested. Thank you
  • Would you like the button text to simply read "Privacy Notice Personnel"? Yes please
  • Layout will follow the same style as shown in the screenshot, with the buttons centered neatly. Thank you

(Time: 5mins) - adding new PDF and changing linked in box. Closing - waiting for customer reply.

Hi Fransie,

Thanks so much for reaching out to Wolf IQ Support.

We’ve replaced the existing Privacy Notice Recruitment with P&C-PRO-012 – Privacy Notice Recruitment—all settled on that front.

Just a quick clarification for the new box you'd like added:
  • We’ll place P&C-PRO-009 – Privacy Notice for Personnel next to the updated one as requested.
  • Would you like the button text to simply read “Privacy Notice Personnel”?
  • Layout will follow the same style as shown in the screenshot, with the buttons centered neatly.

Once we have your confirmation on the label text, we’ll get it all wrapped up.

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
Please add P&C-PRO-009 - Privacy Notice for Personnel next to the Privacy Notice Recruitment box in the EMPLOYMENT Section. Please replace the existing Privacy Notice Recruitment with P&C-PRO-012 - Privacy Notice Recruitment
